message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your price point.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $125. Can you meet me there?
